name: Vieux Carre
notes: Combine ingredients in mixing glass and stir with ice until cold
column5: then strain into glass. Serve over one large ice cube.

name: Pisco Sour
notes: Dry shake all except bitters (no ice) for 10 seconds. Then add ice and shake until cold. Strain into glass and top with bitters.

name: Champagne Cocktail
notes: Drop sugar cube into the flute and douse with the bitters. Then pour in champagne and enjoy.

name: Sazerac
notes: Add the absinthe to the glass and roll it around then discard the extra. Stir the other liquid ingredients with ice until cold then strain into glass. Rub the lemon peel around the rim of the glass then rest on it on the rim.

name: Angostura Fizz
notes: Dry shake all but soda water (no ice) for 10 seconds. Then add ice and shake until cold. Strain into glass and top with soda water.

name: The Bitter Handshake
notes: Make syrup by combining rye and sugar 1:1 then heating until combined. Simmer blood orange juice until reduced by a third or so then let cool. Stir all ingredients with ice until cold and then strain into an old-fashioned glass with one large ice cube.

name: Cricket Ball
notes: Drop sugar cube in the flute and douse with the bitters. Add the Lillet and then add the champagne and stir lightly.

name: Zim Zala Bim
notes: Stir with no ice until sugar dissolves. Then add ice and stir until chilled. Strain into glass. Squeeze the oil from the lemon peel over the glass and discard.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
notes: Dry shake all but soda water (no ice) for 60 seconds. Then add ice and shake until cold. Strain into glass and top with soda water.

name: Montegomatica
notes: Shake all but mint and blackstrap rum until cold and strain into glass. Garnish with mint sprig and float the blackstrap rum over the back of a spoon.

name: Chartreuse Swizzle
notes: Pour all ingredients except garnishes into glass over crushed ice. Swizzle until frost appears on glass and then top with more crushed ice. Top with mint sprig and freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Goslings Swizzle
notes: Pour all ingredients except garnishes into glass over crushed ice. Swizzle until frost appears on glass and then top with more crushed ice. Top with mint sprig and quarter of a spent orange.

name: Mojito
notes: Lightly muddle mint leaves in shaker. Add everything except club soda and shake until cold. Strain in glass and top with club soda and mint sprig.

name: Baker Street Swizzle
notes: Muddle mint leaves with falernum in glass. Pour in absinthe
column6: and crushed ice. Swizzle until frost appears on glass and then top with more crushed ice. Top with the bitters and garnish with mint sprigs.

name: Esplanade Swizzle
notes: Pour all ingredients except garnishes into glass over crushed ice. Swizzle until frost appears on glass and then top with more crushed ice. Top with mint sprig.

name: 100 Year-Old Cigar
notes: Add the absinthe to the glass and roll it around then discard the extra. Stir the other ingredients with ice until cold then strain into glass.
